subject: I am happy to inform you abo
body:
I am happy to inform you about my success in getting those funds
transferred under the co-operation of a new partner from Paraguay
I must inform you That I have raised and signed A bank draft check
worth the sum of US$9,000,000.00 (Nine Million United States Dollars)
in your name as COMPENSATION for your dedication and human contribution
as it were.
Your bank draft check is under the care of Rev.Patrick Okoh,Do not accept
any fax or telephone calls that do not come from Rev.Patrick Okoh He is
the only person I instructed and directed on how to make the payment to you.
I really appreciated your tremendous effort and contribution made to make
things work out but which we couldn't complete due to circumstances beyond
our control.
Email: 
okohpatrick1@outlook.com
Contact person: Rev. Okoh Patrick
MR. Folashodun Shonubi

subject: Re:   I am happy to inform you abo
body:
Hello Mr. Folashodun Shonubi,

Wow, that's quite a lot of money! I'm really surprised to hear about this. Can you tell me more about how this happened? And who is this new partner from Paraguay? 

Also, could you please explain a bit more about the bank draft check? How does it work exactly? 

And who is Okoh? Is he a banker or some sort of financial advisor?

I'm sorry for all the questions, but I'm just trying to understand everything clearly.

Thank you so much for your time and patience.

Best wishes,
Michael

subject: Re:   I am happy to inform you abo
body:
my name is Rev Patrick okoh yes, my beloved brother Mr Folashodun Shonubi,
gave me a bank draft worth $9million United State dollars to keep for you
I have been waiting for your contact since he left. You have the send your
poster address and full name and phone number to enable me send your bank
draft through FedEx or UPS.

forward the below information

1.) Your name in Full:_________________________

2.) Your postal Address:______________________

3.) Your telephone number:______________________

4.) Your nearest airport:______________________

5.) A copy of your identification Card.

Once you receive this mail call me on my cell phone +2347019857674 for more information.
Thanks
Remain blessed

subject: Re:   I am happy to inform you abo
body:
Hello Rev Patrick Okoh,

Thank you for reaching out to me. I'm surprised to hear about this bank draft from Mr. Folashodun Shonubi, as I wasn't expecting anything of the sort. Could you please tell me more about how this came to be? 

I'm also curious about why my nearest airport is needed for sending a bank draft. Could you explain that to me?

Looking forward to hearing from you soon.

Best wishes,
Michael
